WRITING.TEXT: Just watched all 26 episodes, was a wild ride, unfortunately didnt find the scene I was looking for... basically was the move when jin vs. Kariya at the end, when jin says "this can only end with one move" he falls in the lake, its nighttime they're both outside, The move will guarentee kill one person or the other, the person is being taught the move, and the person who is being taught gets the kill, you can see the meat on the person when he cuts through. Idk if u guys know the anime. But thnx anyways
